Libraries:
	Boost
		- http://www.boost.org
		- Subset of 1.53.0 created with
		- ./bcp scoped_array lexical_cast outfolder
		- Boost Software License
	JsonCpp 
		- http://jsoncpp.sourceforge.net/
		- From SVN revision 252
		- MIT License
	libzip
		- Modified version for android
		- https://github.com/julienr/libzip-android
		- BSD License
	OpenALSoft
		- Modified version for android (build on OpenSL)
		- https://github.com/AerialX/openal-soft-android
		- LGPL
	pugixml
		- http://pugixml.org/
		- Version 1.2
		- MIT License
	SDL
		- http://www.libsdl.org/
		- Built from mercurial
		- zlib license
	spine-c
		- http://github.com/EsotericSoftware/spine-runtimes
		- From github on April 8, 2013
		- Spine License - requires attribution
	stb_image
		- http://www.nothings.org/stb_image.c
		- Public Domain
	stb_vorbis
		- http://www.nothings.org/stb_vorbis
		- Version 0.99996
		- Public Domain
	Wm5
		- http://www.geometrictools.com
		- Subset of WildMagic 5.7
		- Boost Software License
    zlib
    	- http://www.zlib.net
    	- version 1.2.7
    	- zlib license
